alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 12:54PM MST until December 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow level dropping to as low as 3500 feet Monday night. Total snow accumulations up to 1 inch between 4000 feet and 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches above 4500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare in advance by having extra food, water, blankets, and a cell phone charger in the vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
